title: Don't Look Away Now!
text:
Don't Look Away Now! is an album by saxophonist <a href="James%20Moody%20%28saxophonist%29">James Moody</a> recorded in 1969 which was released on the <a href="Prestige%20Records">Prestige</a> label.
Reception.
The <a href="Allmusic">Allmusic</a> site awarded the album 4½ stars.
Track listing.
"All compositions by James Moody except as indicated"
